Unknown.name: Zermelo.API
Unknown.description: This is the main namespace, containing the most important classes.

types.name: Authentication
types.summary: A class containing the information used to authenticate a user at the Zermelo API. To create an Authentication object using an authorization code, use the ZermeloAuthenticator class. If you already have a token, you can use the constructor to create an Authentication object.

types.name: ZermeloAuthenticator
types.summary: This class gives an object that can be used to generate an Authentication object using an authorization code. The Authentication object can than be used to connect to the Zermelo API using an ZermeloConnection object.

types.name: ZermeloConnection
types.summary: This class gives an object that can be used to connect to the Zermelo API. It has properties for the currently supported endpoints, that can be used to connect to the corresponding endpoint.
